characterDescription.skinTone: Light olive skin with neutral undertones, some natural pink flush on cheeks and nose, slightly darker around the eyes
characterDescription.eyeColor: Vibrant light blue eyes with a subtly darker blue limbal ring, giving a captivating depth, with small grey speckles
characterDescription.eyeShape: Almond-shaped eyes with a slight downward slant at the outer corners, long and relatively sparse dark brown eyelashes
characterDescription.hairColor: Medium warm brown hair with subtle reddish-bronze highlights, particularly noticeable in direct light, darker at the roots
characterDescription.hairTexture: Slightly wavy hair with some tendency to frizz, medium density, individual strands appear fine but has overall volume
characterDescription.hairStyle: Varies; could be long and loose, in high pigtails/space buns or pulled back into a high ponytail, with loose strands escaping around the face
characterDescription.faceShape: Oval face shape, with slightly prominent cheekbones, a rounded forehead, and a softly defined jawline that is still developing, slightly chubby cheeks
characterDescription.nose: Small to medium nose with a straight bridge and a slightly rounded tip that has a subtle upturn, not overly prominent on the face, slightly wider nostrils
characterDescription.lips: Medium-sized lips with a naturally rosy-pink hue, the upper lip is slightly thinner than the lower lip, which is full, defined cupid's bow
characterDescription.smile: Wide, expressive smile showing the upper teeth, with a noticeable but charming gap between the two front teeth, upper gums are visible when smiling broadly
characterDescription.eyebrows: Medium-thickness dark brown eyebrows, slightly arched shape, a few stray hairs that have not been shaped, relatively close-set
characterDescription.ears: Medium-sized ears that lie relatively close to the head
characterDescription.cheeks: Full cheeks with a natural rosy tint, especially noticeable when smiling, hint of developing cheekbones
characterDescription.chin: Slightly rounded chin with a subtle indentation or cleft, youthful and not overly pronounced
characterDescription.facialProportions: Well-balanced facial proportions, eyes are slightly larger in proportion to the face, nose is in proportion to overall face length
characterDescription.distinctiveFeatures: Noticeable gap between the upper front teeth, slight asymmetry in the placement of the eyebrows (left slightly higher), slightly visible veins under the skin near the inner corner of her eyes, dark beauty mark on the neck slightly on the left side
characterDescription.overallImpression: Endearing and cheerful appearance with a youthful and slightly mischievous glint in her eyes, has a genuine and expressive face
characterDescription.fullDescription: This 7-8-year-old child has light olive skin with neutral undertones and a natural rosy flush to her cheeks. Her vibrant light blue eyes, framed by dark brown eyelashes, are almond-shaped with a subtle downward slant and have tiny grey speckles, while her dark brown hair with reddish bronze highlights is usually in pigtails. She has an oval face shape with slightly prominent cheekbones, medium size rosy pink lips, and medium nose with a straight bridge and slightly rounded tip. Her most distinctive feature is the charming gap between her upper front teeth, which are visible in her wide, expressive smiles, a beauty mark on the neck slightly on the left side and slightly visible veins under the skin near the inner corner of her eyes.
